remarks: The condition describing a fixed ultrafilter always produces an ultrafilter.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 9-Dec-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jul-2015.)
statement:
fixufil $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ A e. X ) -> { x e. ~P X | A e. x } e. ( UFil ` X ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
